topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b480746368727143de0800#post_54b480746368727143de0800
Agreed. Unfortunately a lot of people who are totally cool with brutal dismemberment are uncomfortable when discussion turns to sex. That book is a working example. Its an unofficial supplement that despite generally being positive and enjoyable would never be published by wizards of the coast. They will however publish the book of vile darkness which is all about making evil really, really nasty and actually delivers.
